definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: He is a career-minded young man who puts lots of effort in his work.
sentences.chinese: 他是有事業心的年輕人，把很多精力放在工作上。

sentences.english: Philip was a man of great enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 菲力浦是個事業心很強的人。

sentences.english: Americans are too self-centered, too careerist, goes the criticism.
sentences.chinese: 指責美國人太自私，事業心太強。

definition: home-loving/to feel a strong attachment to home life/to begrudge being away from home
to like to look good in the eyes of others/sensitive about how one is regarded by others/proud
poor wretch/pauper/destitute man/poverty-stricken peasant/penniless good-for-nothing/impecunious vagabond
lit. eats soft food, but refuses hard food (idiom)/amenable to coaxing but not coercion
to take things as they are (idiom)/to leave a situation as it is/to be happy with the status quo
lit. to like the new, and hate the old (idiom); fig. enamored with new people (e.g. new girlfriend), bored with the old
to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/to commit a gaffe
